message: What are the startup accelerators like Flat6Labs out there in Egypt ? is it really good idea to join such accelerators ? any drawbacks or disadvantages ?

data.message: I think Tahrir Sqr is closed!
Cairo Angles are angle investors not accelerators but for business accelerators you have Gesr, TIEC, Ebni , AUC lab, Tamkeen and Innoventure
Nooooooooooooooooooooo, please DO NOT JOIN Mohammad Ali Diab :)

Don't start your business with accelerator, it is too early to give up your company.

Look for European or American accelerator that can accept your situation.

I thought so Amir Abou Eesa :), I Just see many guys  talking about them. actually I find it hard to believe that there are serious Egyptians or Arabian investors who believe in the power of software business, they would prefer spending millions on a new chips factory. 
Ahmed E. Naiem , how to reach such accelerators. is there any real and proven examples of such cooperation ?

Our company is a Flat6Labs alumni from 2012. So to answer this question correctly, you should ask yourself:

- What stage is my business at? Generally, the later you join the more useful the program should be (when you need the cash and connections).
- Do I need funding or can I bootstrap?
- Am I willing to give 15% of my company to get 100K in seed funding or is that too much.

Now a European or US accelerator could be better, but do you have  a product/team that would get you accepted there?

Thanks Ahmed Fathalla, actually the cash is needed in early stages to hire the developers. The 15% shouldn't be too much , but it is too much comparing to the amount of the 100K funding ,  the 100K is somehow low. if you need to hire two "non seniors" developers, you will burn the cache in less than 10 months.
Mohammad Ali Diab I think you should check Y-Combinator. https://www.ycombinator.com  they offer ($120k) inverstment
Before You think about an Accelerator Think about a Problem that Worth Solving! Don't Just go for the Money wise!
